mysteries.name: The Baptism in the Jordan
mysteries.description: Jesus is baptized by John, revealing His divine mission.

mysteries.name: The Wedding at Cana
mysteries.description: Jesus performs His first miracle, turning water into wine.

mysteries.name: The Proclamation of the Kingdom
mysteries.description: Jesus announces the Kingdom of God and calls for repentance.

mysteries.name: The Transfiguration
mysteries.description: Jesus is revealed in glory to Peter, James, and John.

mysteries.name: The Institution of the Eucharist
mysteries.description: Jesus offers His Body and Blood at the Last Supper.
